pr_title: Move validation tools from examples/ module into shell/

timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: Reverted. I made a mistake thinking these are all Methods. Tks for the catch.
replies.author: jiacheliu3

timeline.bodyText: we should avoid catch-all here. Is there a reason to use Exception over InvocationTargetException?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: I think it makes sense to let all the tests complete, instead of letting one ufs operation err out and aborts the runUfsTests.
replies.author: jiacheliu3

timeline.bodyText: should we not put cleanupUfs even on failure?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: Moved cleanupUfs() up into the finally block.
replies.author: jiacheliu3

timeline.bodyText: does this print something different based on whether passed is true or false?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText:
I renamed CliUtils to RunTestUtils, as CliUtils contains only util methods local to runUfsTests, instead of general to all other cli classes.
RunTestUtils.printPassInfo() corresponds to

  
    
      alluxio/examples/src/main/java/alluxio/cli/CliUtils.java
    
    
         Line 34
      in
      c4eba47
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public static void printPassInfo(boolean pass) {
replies.author: jiacheliu3
